title: Australia news live: Investigation into handling of unpaid tax debt as ATO urged to take ‘more compassionate’ approach
summary: Stay updated with real-time news coverage as current events unfold. Get the latest headlines and developments across various topics. Access live updates to stay informed on breaking news.

title: Oxford Union condemns president-elect’s reported comments on Charlie Kirk shooting
summary: Current leadership strongly condemns George Abaraonye's remarks, reaffirming their stance against political violence. They express a unified rejection of any rhetoric that promotes such behavior. The leadership emphasizes a commitment to peaceful political discourse.

title: Charlie Kirk shooting latest: search for shooting suspect continues as FBI asks public for help
summary: The FBI has released images of a shooting suspect and is offering a $100,000 reward for information leading to their apprehension. Meanwhile, Turning Point USA released a statement affirming that Charlie Kirk's legacy will endure. The two events highlight ongoing concerns about public safety and influential figures in conservative circles.

title: The Newsreader review – if this powerful Aussie drama were a US show, it’d be a smash hit
summary: An Australian show set in the 1980s showcases the rivalry between newscasters, delivering a blend of soap opera elements and high drama. Its campy approach adds to the entertainment value, making it stand out as a notable period drama. Viewers are treated to a nostalgic and exaggerated portrayal of the media world during that era.

title: Catalans Dragons deal major blow to Leeds’ hopes of top-two finish
summary: Leeds suffered a setback in their bid for a top-two finish in the Super League after falling to the Catalans Dragons. The match ended with a score of 16-8 in favor of Catalans. This loss puts Leeds' playoff ambitions at risk.
